title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. N, pt. 550 - Public Access To The Records Of The Office For Technology
content:

State Regulations
§ 550.1 - Purpose and scope
§ 550.2 - Definitions
§ 550.3 - Duties of the records access officer
§ 550.4 - Subject matter list
§ 550.5 - Requests for public access to records
§ 550.6 - Inspecting and copying of records
§ 550.7 - Protection of trade secrets
§ 550.8 - Procedure to be followed in the event of denial of access to records or denial of exception from disclosure
§ 550.9 - Fees
§ 550.10 - Public notice

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. N, pt. 550

Statutory authority: Public Officers Law, art. 6; Executive

Law, §§ 206- a[11], 208

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
